website_summaries.verdict: This set of glass bowls excel when it comes to practicality, plus they stand up to chips, cracks, and thermal shock better than competitors.
pros: Although still breakable, Duralex bowls are made of tempered glass that does a good job resisting breakage
6 3/4-inch size is versatile – can be used for mixing smaller portions and serving dishes like salads and main courses
Safe to use in the dishwasher and microwave
cons: Company name is in raised letters on the insides of the bowls, which may be annoying to some consumers
Some bowls were broken when they arrived

customer_reviews.title: Love Duralex
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed these bowls until I spent the day doing a Food Network marathon and watching Ina, Valerie, and Giada. These bowls are fantastic. They help organize the ingredients so you don't forget something (which I have done on occasion). Laying everything out before you start cooking is actually a time saver and helps taking the stress out of cooking and making it more fun. These bowls are durable and I absolutely love that they are made in La France. These are a great investment. Purchased several different sets and love them all. Bon Appétit!
customer_reviews.author: Zen L.

customer_reviews.title: There is an indent of the product name on the inside of the bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these bowls because of the "Duralex" indented imprint on the inside of each bowl. I love the look and size of these...however the risk of that indented logo chipping from a spoon or something and unknowingly ingesting glass was a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: glass bowls'ave writte to you before - I love this product and use the FIVE bowls.  One arrived shattered as you can see
customer_reviews.text: great product - They were carefully packed for shipment BUT one bowl arrived shattered [see photo} - these bowls are great for serving pasta, cereal etc. I use these bowls every day and will order Duralex glassware again. I love these bowls but one arrived shattered - see photo. I would like a credit for one bowl or a replacement of one bowl
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose bowls.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Perfect size for lots of things. I make up tuna salad in them, use for cereal, salads and storing leftovers. They're a clean simple design that looks nice, is easy to clean and microwave safe. They're replacing plastic - you know that party type - that I'd used for years but am replacing all plastic in my kitchen. Duralex may be more expensive than other glass bowls, but are thermal shock resistant and hold up well without chipping or easily breaking. They stack well so they don't take up a lot of space. Will be buying more Duralex items - am really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ricracTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls, Nice Size and No Problems
customer_reviews.text: Great bowls, good size and no problems. A few months after buying the first group of 6, I ordered them again so I could phase out all my non-glass bowls. They aren't that cheap but they have been worth it for me, and no issues whatsoever. They've held up to heat and cold but obviously too rapid of a temperature change in class can make it more susceptible to breaking although all mine are in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Vince G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Nice shape! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love?! FINALLY the right size of bowls for the family! Great for anything from cereal, to salad, to pasta, and soup. Convenient shape. Sturdy. The clear, yet thick, glass is just beautiful. I'm now considering their small equivalent for ice cream - pretty much the only thing I wouldn't serve in these bowls :)
customer_reviews.author: M.G.H.

customer_reviews.title: Best bowls money can buy imo
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the cups and liked them so much decided to get the whole set and so far I think these are the best bowls I ever seen. Very durable and great looking and even in the microwave they hardly even get hot! My old bowls would burn my hand only after like 2 mins these I grab and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L.

customer_reviews.title: Return options are costly
customer_reviews.text: looked great, but too large for what I needed, sending back, but very disappointed in return method. Only free option is returning through Kohls. Current environment, I will not go in kohls, so I have to pay to return. Not happy with lack of no cost return.
customer_reviews.author: jamirob

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves these bowls! They are the perfect size - deep enough for an adult portion of cereal, ice cream sundaes, etc. but very easily stackable so they don't take up tons of room in the cabinet. Very durable, thick glass. You get what you pay for - and for nice quality like these, I am very happy with the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: V. Petrushun

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and larger for adults
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. A couple have been dropped a few times and they didn’t break! They are large though. These each can hold a quart of fluid! A little big for cereal. We ordered the 4-3/4 inch size for cereal for the kids but I like these adult size bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo M

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: This are really good bowls and they are a bit on the larger side but we love them. They stack beautifully in the cupboard so none of that tipsy turvy stacking you get with some bowls. They work everywhere and we use them every day. Wish there was a medium sized bowl, then I would get a dozen of them.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonian

customer_reviews.title: Style, Quality, Hardiness, Versatility, all in a Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, I love these. We use them for breakfast, and often again for soup with lunch or dinner, and I had my Sango Sango faves before these arrived. Best buy I made for the kitchen this year.
customer_reviews.author: Luckytess

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE LITTLE BOWLS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these little bowls. I use them for meal prep or even filling as tableware if I need extra dishes. Seem very sturdy and the ability to see through them makes it even better. Haven't had them very long but so-far-so-good.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like how hot they get when microwaved.
customer_reviews.text: I love how deep these bowls are. I bought them because they are microwaveable but I have noticed they do get hot when you microwave something. I didn’t think microwaveable bowls were supposed to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them
customer_reviews.text: One of these shattered after the second use. I bought them because they were supposed to be durable. It basically exploded across three of my rooms and was very very hard to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Hadley M.

customer_reviews.title: Tough Duralax Bowls
customer_reviews.text: These Duralex bowls are awesome, they are so durable. They arrived on time. I would definitely recommend these bowls for anyone looking for new bowls this size. Again I will say they are very durable, I dropped a bowl on my granite floor it didn’t break. I was amazed. I have had them a few months now and they are still totally clear. I love filling them up for cereal in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Purplebikegrip

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter found these perfect bowls and I was skeptical because the price is so nice, though they turned out to be made really good and I’m satisfied with the quality. Being I don’t use microwaves or dishwashers I cannot comment on how they hold up though I’m happy to not have lead in my dinnerware.
customer_reviews.author: AJW

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought something different
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are pretty big. They look and feel really cheap. I don’t recommend them. I think you could buy something of better quality for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Chasse

customer_reviews.title: Durable, dishwasher and Microwave safe
customer_reviews.text: Second time I ordered these. The first order I've had for a year + with no issues. Super durable, microwaveable and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: Shant

customer_reviews.title: perfect size bowls for side dishes
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty glass bowls I love Duralex glassware; products are very durable. These bowls are a nice size. Deep enough to cook oatmeL in the microwave without spilling over. They are also a good size for side items on a family dinner tAble.
customer_reviews.author: M Hill

customer_reviews.title: Annoying and unnecessary etching!
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are fine except that the company logo and made in France are etched INSIDE the bowl. Every time you stir something you feel and hear the etching. Poor choice of where to place this, why not on the bottom of the outside of the bowl? Deal killer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too large for us, but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bowls and they ended up being too large for my liking. One bowl in the box was chipped, so I sent them back and got a refund immediately and ordered the smaller bowls. Although these weren't what I was hoping for, they were nice looking bowls. I've been happy with all of our Duralex dishes so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, these wear like iron!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size - my teenagers are finally leaving my mixing bowls where they belong, this is a generous bowl for cereal, ice cream, salad. Every one of these gets used on a daily basis in our 4-person household. I love that there is no little rim on the bottom, like there is on ceramic bowls... you know, the rim that collects water after the dishwasher is run. Anyway, we've been using constantly for >6 months, still look like new.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hallet

customer_reviews.title: My family and I like these bowls
customer_reviews.text: My family and I like these bowls. They're the perfect size for cereal and salads. They're durable and do well in the dishwasher. The only small thing I don't like is the "Made in France" and "Duralex" embossed stamps they put on the INSIDE of the bowl. So, sometimes the spoon or fork will bump into the raised glass at those points. Maybe someone will suggest to them to put those stamps on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Willette Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Shattered bowl
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken during transit. I could tell it was broken before opening the box because you can hear shattered glass rolling inside. I didnt even open the pastic. One of the middle bowls that were stacked shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Duralex Clear bowls
customer_reviews.text: Had bought 5 a few yrs ago at a local retail shop however they no longer carry them. What a wonderful find to find the bowls offered on Amazon.com - I use them for soups, salads, melting chocolate - various colors of icing/frosting to decorate cookies - etc - the dishwasher handles the hard stuff - getting them clean again!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Generous size
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I was expecting, but overall great for soup or cereal. Just my watch the portion size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great glass bowls
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I anticipated. I wanted to supplement a smaller set of Duralex bowls I had which have held help very well over many years. These are well l made and more attractive in person than on the website. No problems with breakage but the packaging was unbelievably good. Very happy - now if some smaller ones two.
customer_reviews.author: BMan

customer_reviews.title: These versatile bowls are hardy, but handsome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stackable bowls that match my glass salad and dinner plates! So easy to dress them up for a romantic evening, and equally easy to use these sturdy items for a barbeque.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great bowls. I use them for meal prep & fixing small salads. They are also quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: I just love them
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the bowels the cleaning them is fast they are used for salads soup space saving stacking is also great
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Slightly bigger than the average cereal bowl, I actually wanted cereal bowls but they will work. Nice quality and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: devinemrs

customer_reviews.title: clean nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Actually bigger than expected, but that's our fault. Otherwise seem well made, clean nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this 5 stars because the quality and size of these are perfect for what we were looking for. Not too big or too small for cereal, ice cream, salads, etc. Very well packed also!
customer_reviews.author: RedRebelChick

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bowls
customer_reviews.text: As folks used to say, these will probably see me out. Very well made. Some reviewers do not like the high lip, but I do. Easy to hold on to (especially for small fingers). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Still St. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of bowls and need ones that are sturdy, microwavable, and dishwasher safe. These fit the bill. Design is nice and simple; love that you can see through the bowl; stack great. Friends have commented how much they like them also. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: dhollis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted - Stackable, sturdy, prep bowls
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls. I have a tiny kitchen with no counter space and cook regularly. These bowls allow me to prep my ingredients in advance and don't take up a ton of room in my cupboard. I've had them for a few months now and wonder why I waited so long to order them.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel Artist

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & functional!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls were perfect for our needs. I didn't want plastic but I didn't want glass to shatter.
customer_reviews.author: Family22

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bowls for cereal, soup, and salad
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and sturdy bowls, easy to clean, and good for anything that you can think of - soup, salad, cereal, prepping veggies, etc. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Ofelia Nikolova

customer_reviews.title: Very durable bowl made in France is great. I didn't need 6
customer_reviews.text: Very durable bowl made in France is great. I didn't need 6, and hope they'll add more choices for customers such as like set of 4 or 5. I feel safe microwave this, worry-free of a chemical used in a graze.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. Perfect size to have a one course meal in. I bought a second set! I also bought a set of the larger ones, and love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bowls, not sure if that is what I needed. It turns out they are the perfect size for what I need them for, cereal & soups. I'm going to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Balam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bowls
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for five years. They are microwave safe, thick, high quality, and nice. A++ Would do again. As a surfer would say: totally tubular dude!
customer_reviews.author: McLovin

customer_reviews.title: Love these, the kids and I use them everyday
customer_reviews.text: Love these, the kids and I use them everyday. So far none have been broken and they look beautiful in my cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Stacks insanely well.
customer_reviews.text: Best dish that I bought. France knows what it takes to make great dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: I love these bowls
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! They are deep enough and designed to stack so when you do stack them the edges don't chip.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size, nice and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are a really great size. A lot of prep bowls are quite small, which is fine for things like spices and the like, but not as great for things like chopped vegetables, etc. I also use these to mix food coloring into frosting for cake decorating and the like - the size of the bowl is big enough to stir without spilling everything over the sides. They also stack quite nicely, minimizing their footprint when storage space is tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I still like these bowls, but 4 were broken on delivery
customer_reviews.text: I think the bowls are nice, but four were broken on delivery. This was disappointing, since I partly ordered them because they were supposed to be durable. But I also ordered them because I like the size (good cereal bowl size--not too small and not too big) and that they're clear glass--so I like them. Maybe the breaking thing was a fluke. Luckily, Amazon had good customer service. I also liked that the bowls were made in France--not China. I'm a slight snob about those things.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and sturdy bowls - great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for salads, cereal, and ice cream. Microwave safe, and durable. Great price for these attractive and functional bowls - use them everyday!
customer_reviews.author: sewingB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are the perfect size for a generous bowl of cereal, just as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bowls in a convenient size.
customer_reviews.text: I will use the bowls for cereal, salads and soups.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Work fine but a little more industrial than we thought would ...
customer_reviews.text: Work fine but a little more industrial than we thought would be, but not so much that we would exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald McKinsey

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: So many uses excellent size. Use either for prep or small serving
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple Elegance
customer_reviews.text: They are big, much bigger than custard cups which the resemble in shape and material. Filled to the brim they hold 24 ounces (3 cups) each. We use them every day for cereal, soup, grapes, leftovers. The glass has a nice feel to it. They go in dishwasher and microwave with no worries.
customer_reviews.author: miacid

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, sturdy, practical set of all-purpose bowls.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Leave it to the French to design something so practical and attractive. Just the right size. Great for soup, salad, anything you want to serve in a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: good  size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for soup/cereal; not the same quality as the glasses I have. One chipped after one trip in the dishwasher -- I didn't even get to use it! So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great soup and cereal bowls
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time to heat up a bowl of soup or make oatmeal. The size is perfect. My only complaint is that sometimes they are not easy to stack. They have to line up just right.
customer_reviews.author: Jan D.

customer_reviews.title: a good size
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are are bigger than the usual bowls for cereal or salad and are great for soup or pasta. They arrived on time and are exactly as I expected. A good choice and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Posy

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and shape of these bowls
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and shape of these bowls. When they arrived, I thought they were just what I was looking for, BUT...I also HATE that the manufacturer has chosen to put "Duralex" and "Made in France" in raised letters on the INSIDE of the bowl, where every time my metal spoon passes by, while eating or mixing, it makes a horrible chattering, grinding sort of noise. After three months of using these on a daily basis, I'm ready to give them to Goodwill and let someone else suffer. Sad, but true-- I can't stand them any more.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Canuck

customer_reviews.title: Duralex bowl
customer_reviews.text: Little to big for a salad bowl but will last and a little hard to fit into the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: John Manogian

customer_reviews.title: Hand Grenade of Glass
customer_reviews.text: This is a hand grenade of glass. It doesn’t just break like normal glass when dropped, it shatters like a car window but unlike car glass it splinters in 10,000 tiny shards that literally filled the entire kitchen from a small fall from our daughter from about 1.5 feet above a wood floor. I bought these thinking these were somehow tougher than normal glass. I was very wrong.
customer_reviews.author: S1Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good bowls, I just bought the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great! Only downside for me was not knowing how big they actually were. I saw the size, but didn't think much of it when ordering. They're about the size of a cereal bowl - so they might be great for separating a large amount of different ingredients, but for my purposes I need to order smaller ones - maybe half the size. I don't fault them for my mistake - they're great bowls for what they are!
customer_reviews.author: Abraham V.

customer_reviews.title: All but one broken
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even owned these bowls for a year and they ALL broke except one (usually after going through the dishwasher)... ridiculous! and SUPER dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Marie B

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE BOWLS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to buy these glass bowls for the longest time. The size is PERFECT to use in meal prep, especially stir fry, where different vegetable ingredients are added at different times. On the other hand, they are small enough to use as a "dinner bowl" from which to eat some things. I just love these versatile bowls and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Silver_Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, durable bowls that make excellent bowls to microwave soup. They are easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good quality bowls for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I received this order a few weeks ago. I am attempting to get rid of my plastic bowls since my kids tend to microwave food often, I thought it be healthier if we switch to glass. The bowls fit to the description. The quality is good, and they are very durable. I mean I have 5 kids so I need to be sure these bowls won't break so easily. My kids use it for cereal, soups, and ramen. I will be sure to purchase another set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: These work great for many purposes
customer_reviews.text: I love these for soup, serving, and storage in the refrigerator. I put a silicone lid on the top of them and it is super easy to see what is stored in the refrigerator. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: C. N. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This set of quality bowls replaced a quantity of lightweight plastic bowls in my cupboard. I use them for oatmeal quite regularly, and sometimes for meal prep as they are a good size to hold chopped onion and such. The glass feels like it will last a very long time, are sturdy and look nice. I'm happy with them because they work for me and have freed me from concern of plastic in microwaves. I also trust Made in France for food items - much more so than from other places where manufacturing materials and process are, shall we say, more open to interpretation?
customer_reviews.author: David Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple tough bowls
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace other glass bowls that did not hold up to temperature changes. These are a nice size for cereal or pasta or soup for an adult. Also good for a small serving bowl. Very utilitarian looking. I would not put them on the dining room table. Great for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pako

customer_reviews.title: These are great bowls!
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice size, the glass is thick, and they are usefully shaped. They are used everyday. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glass bowls
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what they claim. They are study, they stack up nicely and they are perfect size for cereal bowls or oatmeal. They can take hot or cold liquids and they are microwave and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile for shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that I don't recommend getting online. The glass bowls are fragile and almost all arrived chipped or scratched, despite lots of packing material. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: S. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Wanting to replace the cheap Ikea bowls I had been using for years, I decided tempered glass was a perfect way to avoid eating out of something that could contain things I didn't want touching my food. These bowls are a perfect size for cereal/oatmeal/granola/soup/anything really, and super easy to clean by hand (just don't let them slip). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: zenprism

customer_reviews.title: Feel solid, look great
customer_reviews.text: Liked them well enough that after a couple of months we decided to buy a 2nd set of 6.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kronvold

customer_reviews.title: Hardly ever break!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 5 or 6 these bowls for over 20 years, they almost never break. I bought only a few as that was all I could get at the time. (before amazon). I just purchasedmore bowls and they are still just as great as the first ones (still using). They out last any other glass product. Love using for microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Aisjah H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find medium-large sized glass bowls. Stack well ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find medium-large sized glass bowls. Stack well with the outer lip feature. Reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the some high cost for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Big A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Large deep bowls. Love the way they stack! Came out of the dishwasher crystal clear using my environmentally friendly detergent and no rinse aid.
customer_reviews.author: Hall Family

customer_reviews.title: Tough and good looking
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for microwavable bowl not made of plastic. Looked at various ceramics, but these tempered glass bowels were the most durable. We bought a dozen of them and are very happy with them. I'd get the dishes too, buy my wife likes her old family plates.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality & sturdy, tired of the cheaper breakable glass bowls. I use these & I use 2 for my dogs as food dishes.
customer_reviews.author: gdb

customer_reviews.title: excellent bowls
customer_reviews.text: Functional, no-nonsense cereal/soup bowls ever. Well made; so far they have resisted chipping and scratching. My husband injured his hand and has trouble holding a spoon. Other bowls I tried out had too-shallow sides and a too-small usable diameter for him to use comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: cesaly

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: We use these in hair salon to mix color and paint
customer_reviews.author: John Green

customer_reviews.title: Use them every day
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect everyday bowl size. We use them for everything from cereal to salad to soup. Have two boys (tween and teen) and they haven't been able to damage them yet! Will definitely buy this brand again when I'm in the market for more dinnerware.
customer_reviews.author: Telaran

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, doesn't break easily
customer_reviews.text: I cracked two glass bowls after heating oatmeal in the microwave and then adding cold milk. Oops. I wanted something that was more resistant to temperature swings, would work as a salad or cereal bowl, and that I could also use as a prep bowl. These do all of the above. Edited to add: It's been at least a year since I purchased these now. I have not broken any, but the two remaining regular glass bowls of the same size are long gone. I use these regularly - probably more than any bowl in my house.
customer_reviews.author: GF in CA

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: There is only one little irritating thing about these bowls. There is a raised printed word in the inside bottom and I hit it with the spoon. It also feels like debris when washing the bowl. Otherwise, I still give them 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lynch

customer_reviews.title: These bowls are awesome. They're the perfect size for soup bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are awesome. They're the perfect size for soup bowls, or cereal, or for mixxing up small amounts of things. They are durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: UnixSkunk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls they stack nicely, I went and bought another set since I use them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Suz L.

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls. I really like them
customer_reviews.text: Great bowls. I really like them. Great for a big bowl of some cereal. They also are great for pasta. Nice and easy to stack. Easy to clean - nothing gets stuck to them. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Boyds

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great. Seem like good quality. They all arrived ok, non were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls! They are the perfect size, they look good, and they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Product line!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product line! We buy additional pieces every few months as our cheap local store glass dishes bite the big one (which doesn't actually take much effort!).
customer_reviews.author: Vita Mazzaluna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: These are thick and sturdy. They are dishwasher safe and handle the micro pretty well (but can get hot from hot food). I have yet to put one in the oven but I will try that soon.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how useful these little prep bowls would be. I made a Thai papaya salad with at least 8 ingredients. I pre measured them into these bowls and it was a breeze to put the dish together.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beales

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I was going to like these as much as I do. They're large and feel really sturdy. If I can't keep my kids from breaking bowls, I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KerryWhite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are as I expected, since I had six, but broke four, and order six more.
customer_reviews.author: jr1

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bowls
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in several sizes to replace clear bowls that had been badly scratched over the years by the dishwasher. We love them. The hold what the say they hold and look really nice.. CAUTION: they are very slick, so hold on tight!
customer_reviews.author: G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for breakfast cereal soup or whatever my family wishes. Beautiful in their simplicity and because they are duralex I know they will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the rim that keeps them nicely stacked. They work very well in the microwave. Nuke 1/2 cup of oats for 80 seconds on full power and 3 minutes on 30%. Boom, oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Zer0

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these bowls. I have other Duralex bowls and they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta P. Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy big bowls. Good for soup, salad, ice cream with all toppings. Clean well in dishwasher. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: A great product and very durable. I would recommend this type of dish ware to anyone needing good bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Tony A. Albert

product_meta.title: Duralex Made In France Lys 6-3/4-Inch Stackable Clear Bowl, Set of 6
product_meta.description: Founded in 1929, Duralex has been manufacturing glassware and tabletop products in la chapelle-saint-mesmin, a city in the heart of France. Since 1939, when Duralex invented the glass tempering process, the name Duralex has been associated with resilient glassware, thanks to their proprietary tempering process. The original tempered (toughened) picardie glasses are still in production in France and are known as the “original french tumblers.” The picardie glass is the perfect weight: functional yet stylish and feels extremely comfortable in the hand. They are equally suitable for cold or hot drinks, conveniently stackable, impact and chip resistant, microwave and dishwasher safe. With the help of continuous investments and commitment to quality, Duralex has reached a level of excellence that makes its products recognized throughout the world. Duralex is and will always remain a true french manufacturer of glassware and tabletop products, and is the only glass manufacturer that makes 100-percent of their products in France. Cleaning :Wash before use. Soak the dish in soapy water for 20 minutes. Do not use metallic sponges, pads, powders or abrasives.To remove hard water stains, try vinegar. If this doesn't work, we suggest trying a hard water product called LemiShine which can be found at the local grocery store. Then trying soaking your glassware in LemiShine and warm water.
feature_bullets: Lys 6 piece set includes 6.75 inch stackable clear bowls
The original french tumbler, made by the company that invented tempered glass
Duralex is 2-1/2 times more resistant to breakage, sudden thermal shock and chipping than normal glass
Duralex glass is very hygienic: it is non-porous and does not absorb liquids, colors or flavors
Dishwasher, fridge and microwave safe; products maintain the original look for years
